overview: When you're trying to stand out in the corporate world, sometimes Pumping For Promotion is the only way to leave your mark. Award-winning director Tom Moore presents a fisting fantasy of 6 gaping studs that are eager to stand out and climb the corporate ladder. Climbing the corporate ladder can be a hard job, but it's not so bad when you're 'Pumping For Promotion'.
title: Pumping For Promotion
